import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Delete user"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"delete"}
  path={"/api/v2.0/users/delete/{userId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Permanently deletes a single user by their unique identifier.

**Use Cases**:
- Employee offboarding
- Student graduation/transfer cleanup
- GDPR/data retention compliance

**Warning**: This action is permanent. The user account, along with associated assignments and permissions, will be removed. Ticket history and audit logs may be retained for compliance purposes.

**Prerequisites**:
- Verify the user exists using [GET /api/v2.0/users/get/\{userId\}](/docs/api/users/get-user-by-id)
- Ensure no critical open tickets are assigned to this user

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"userId","in":"path","required":true,"description":"Unique identifier of the user to delete.","schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"example":"51c89694-ae9f-f011-8e61-6045bd7991ab"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}

>
  
</StatusCodes>
